title: The Cursed Brothers
description: Your child will be born but he won’t bring joy…was the beginning of the prophecy Reian shared with the king and his first knight Hikari when she first came to the Dawn kingdom, and for four years they waited in fear ,hoping it was a false claim, but when Kandra was found in a puddle of blood with no sign of the puppy he was playing with, they knew it started, leaving them with no choice but to listen to King Relyang and perform the rituals,A tale of two brothers with engravings on their back, holding a dark secret making their relationship beyond the bound of brotherhood, and with the black witch Zefra scheming in the dark their life wouldn’t be easier.Secrets, sacrifices, abduction, and Magic that’s what awaits you within the pages.
author: Yasmeen Al-Maimani
